name: Feed Me If You Love Me
name_original: Feed Me If You Love Me
description:
Help Caroline to keep her cute friend🌱 alive. Feed her with whatever asks even it is very unusual!🩸

How to play: Use ⬅️⬆️⬇️➡️ and Spacebar ➖(In xBox controller use Joystick + A button)

Jose M. Olea - Programming
Alicia Pereira- Art
Verónica Pérez - Programming

This game was created in 72h for the Ludum Dare 46 in 2020
License Creative commons.
